pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Moving Forward</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">The meeting with Dr. Hayes went well, and the three of you agreed that you should provide more information to the office staff regarding insurance coverage. You were able to develop some strategies for addressing prescribing hassles that satisfied both Dr. Bennett and Dr. Hayes. Now that you have addressed Dr. Bennett’s and Dr. Hayes’ concerns about the patient cost and the hassles of prescribing your product, they are on-board with beginning more of their patients on your product.</welcomeText>
